subject: Cable pc to control box gran rumble
description_text:
Hi, i order from aliexpress your rumble and control box, and i have a moza
pedala, but with the order don’t coming the pc cable for the control box of
the rumble, can I use and other type of cable usb-b or i need to purchase
one of yours??

conversations.body_text: Hi luca pavanello,     You will need a USB-A data cable, typically the same type used for printer connections.

Thank you for your answer.

Il giorno mer 7 gen 2026 alle 08:39 service@simsonn.com
